website_summaries.verdict: A good buy if you like the natural stone construction. However, these coasters aren't practical for everyone.
pros: Resists slips and won't stick to cups and glasses
cons: They are somewhat delicate and may break if dropped

customer_reviews.title: They're better than any I've used but aren't perfect
customer_reviews.text: I drink a lot of ice water and I bought these to collect the condensation. They're better than any I've used but aren't perfect. PROS: heavy enough that they don't lift up with my glass; attractive and non-staining; no run-off; dry fairly quickly. CONS: some water still collects on top; glass will still drop water; have to cycle through a couple of them for individual usage.
customer_reviews.author: Aziza

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, durable, and functional
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I've had them for about a year and none of them have broken. The cork is holding up well, and they look great. If someone spills on them, they wash off easily. Even some red fruit juice I was sure would stain washed off after a soak. Many guests have commented on them. Every single one is unique and they all look great. I'd recommend buying more than one set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These coaster work really, really well
customer_reviews.text: We've had these coasters for about 6 months now. My husband drinks his beverages very cold, so his glasses sweat a lot, especially through the summer. The coasters absorbed all moisture very well, so we had no dripping, etc. The cork bottom holds them in place well -- the arm of my hair is a slight incline, but it stays in place without inching its way down the slope. They are very pretty, and we are very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Annakelly

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: The worst thing about these stones is the price is driving up! I am buying more as Christmas gifts for work and I couldn't believe I'm paying $5 more than my set... but its worth it. I have a lot of cheap, DIY and other sets of coasters, but these ones I love. Is it worth $5 per coaster? That's your call, I think it is as I've dropped these and these ones haven't broke. (The ones that are blended to make your own messages or what not do break easy.) Just for amazon, I uploaded my set, a years worth of use with the bottom right one soaked under water.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler B.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful And Absorbs Condensation.
customer_reviews.text: They look beautiful and they absorb condensation very well. I had a glass of iced water placed on it for an entire dinner and there was no liquid on left on it at all. It absorbed all the condensation then dried out naturally after about 10 minutes and still looked like it was brand new. I got the Thirstystone Pedestal Coaster Holder in Bamboo to go along with them and they look beautiful together. I received a lot of compliments on how nice it looks. The only caveat is that if you happen to drop one on the floor accidentally, it will break. You have to be careful handling them.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for beauty and function!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and more absorbent than I thought! I only wish there was a lip to contain the super sweaty drinks. Once the condensation did make it off of the coaster, down the desk, onto the floor. Just once though! Other than that, these lovely coasters have been perfect! They look nice enough to have anywhere or gift. They're heavy enough to stay in place but not so heavy that it is a chore to move them. I recommend this product, especially if it is a version with a lip to hold in any liquid that hasn't been absorbed yet.
customer_reviews.author: Trixie Copperton

customer_reviews.title: These coasters suck
customer_reviews.text: Really. they suck and we are so happy about that. We used to use any old thing for a coaster (even flooring sample squares) but they always just puddled the condensation and drip onto the table. We moved recently and I knew I wanted something better for our new table. I picked these up as I had some ThirstyStones a while back. They are terrific. slightly lighter/cooler than I thought but still look and feel great. these are VERY smooth and we have no more puddles. We've had a few people say "oh those look cool" or "really neat"...I'd recommend these for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J. Ramage

customer_reviews.title: Do not absorb water.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these coasters due to favorable reviews. Though they look nice, the are not absorbant. The water builds up on the coasters and the bottom of your glass sticks to coaster, which promptly falls off when you pick up your glass. The excess water runs down the side of the coaster on to your table. Please see photos. I DO NOT RECOMMEND THESE.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia M. Herrman

customer_reviews.title: Truly awesome coasters
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for almost 4 years now and they are still holding up great. At least 3 of them are used pretty much daily. They are all stain free, undamaged and just as absorbent as when I first got them. Multiple drinks with lots of ice in glasses have been left on the coasters overnight on wooden tables without issue. These are awesome and are great insurance policies for your furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am a little disappointed with these coasters
customer_reviews.text: I am a little disappointed with these coasters. They don't absorb as much water as I expected they would. I think, perhaps, humidity causes a glass of ice water to sweat more profusely than it would in drier weather. These coasters do their best, but water still puddles under the glass, and you have to blot the bottom of it on a paper towel or something to keep it from dripping. They are better though, than plain cork coasters.
customer_reviews.author: Eve3Faces

customer_reviews.title: Will Buy More of These Coasters
customer_reviews.text: I have used these coasters since December and love them. They have protected my copper coffee table, as promised. There are no discolorations on them at all. They are still in the same perfect shape as the day I received them and we're going on 5-6 months. There is nothing not to like about them--attractive color, sturdy, keep my table dry and no change in color whatsoever. I have not dropped any, but I would expect them to break if dropped on a hard floor, since they are stone. i plan on buying another set!
customer_reviews.author: Diane MC

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pieces that absorb a good amount of condensation.
customer_reviews.text: Being cut discs of sandstone, each piece is unique. They're very attractive, and quite absorbent. The only reason they loose a star is that due to the material (sandstone) they can crack and break if you're rough with them. That's not really something they're at fault for, but it is something to be aware of. There is a bit of cork on the bottom if you want to use them on something with a delicate surface, but be careful with them.
customer_reviews.author: J. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Super Thirsty Coasters!
customer_reviews.text: These are super thirsty! They are big and extremely absorbent. I have a 1/2 gallon plastic water bottle that sweats a lot. I fill it up twice each day, so there’s a lot of condensation off that bottle. I use a new coaster when I fill up my bottle the second time to allow the other one to air dry. These coasters have no problem soaking up all that sweat and dry fairly quickly. These coasters keep my end table dry. So much better than my old cheap coasters!
customer_reviews.author: Kim DeRoest

customer_reviews.title: If you have to buy some coasters, just get these and never have to think about it ever again.
customer_reviews.text: Now that I'm getting to the point in my life where I have opinions on coasters, these are great little coasters. They have a cork backing so they don't scratch my few pieces of non-Ikea furniture. They blend in and look classy. They do their job and *don't* let puddles of water build up, causing the coaster to stick to the glass then the coaster falls off when you pick up the glass to drink from it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey N

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & absorbent!
customer_reviews.text: These coasters are beautiful and they work great! They get more detailed when wet! I bought them for our master & guest bedroom, and they really are so neutral that I can't see these not fit in any decor or room. I will be getting more to replace the ones I have in the coffee/wine bar. I will be posting photos once I take a few. I've had these for about a week but i can see these lasting years as long as we don't break any. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Love these coasters and get years of use
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these ThirstyStone coasters for many years in various shapes, though I always get the ones without a painted design that might deflect water and reduce their 'thirsty' properties. They absorb most of the condensation from a cold, iced beverage and do a better job of protecting furniture than just flat coasters that allow the water to run off. I also love the natural sandstone look, and the fact that as natural products they're all slightly different. I've given them as housewarming gifts for years and always see them being used by the recipient when I visit - so I know they're appreciated!
customer_reviews.author: ATLLeader

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great and Very Absorbent
customer_reviews.text: As the headline mentions, these coasters look great and do exactly what I hoped they would do. Which is absorb moisture from condensation. The cork base is a definite plus to keep the furniture surfaces protected from the stone. Nice décor and practical!
customer_reviews.author: valley2013

customer_reviews.title: Does what it needs to
customer_reviews.text: In an effort to protect my new marble coffee table, I bought these coasters. They do what it needs to, are made of natural sandstone and aren't offensive to look at. I like that they have weight to it as I’ve had too lightweight of coasters in the past that would stick to the cup after condensation set. This hasn’t happened with these coasters. I wish they came with a holder but they stack up nice enough.
customer_reviews.author: liz7435

customer_reviews.title: The ones I got are pretty, but look much more like circular slabs of ...
customer_reviews.text: As most reviewers mention, the photo of the product is misleading. The ones I got are pretty, but look much more like circular slabs of cedar wood with straight grain lines that the image for the product. I ordered in a very hot/humid time, but the weather has mostly been cooler since the arrival of these coasters. They have absorbed any condensation from cold water containers. The amount of condensation to be absorbed has been fairly small, but I'm hopeful this coaster will remain "thirsty" and do their job.
customer_reviews.author: Chandra L. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Don't even consider buying anything other than a Thirstystone
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for decades, and they are the only ones that actually WORK, absorb all water, don't leak onto counter and dry clean without molding. Do NOT buy ones with painted tops, go natural. The painted tops prevent total water absorption. For the price difference, I wouldn't go for a knock-off. These are proven awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly kosmin

customer_reviews.title: Great coasters!
customer_reviews.text: These are beautifully crafted coasters. They are heavy and really do absorb very well. They are solid and each one is individual in design. Very reasonably priced and very well made. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Adams

customer_reviews.title: Simply awesome
customer_reviews.text: No idea how it absorbs the way it does but it works amazingly. The reason I opted for these was the already good reviews of the absorbancy and they are all correct. I tend to have my drinks in non-insulated cups, which tend to drip ALL the time. These take that dripping no problem and leave no marks at all. Some products will get 'soggy', drip the condensation to the side spilling over (defeats the whole purpose), or even 'bleed' if there's too much dripping but these don't break a sweat. Awesome gift or self purchase. 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: MrPasghetti

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 30 years. Durable product.
customer_reviews.text: We have had our first set circa 1990s from parents. Still using daily and we needed more with a growing family. Looking forward to using the originals and these new ones for another 30 years.
customer_reviews.author: MomWarEagle

customer_reviews.title: Great coasters for drinks that sweat
customer_reviews.text: I have bought a couple sets for my house, and I've bought them as gifts for others as well. They are fantastic, especially if you have drinks with ice and glasses that sweat. It will absorb whatever you throw at it. They protect any surface you set them on. They look great, and have held up well over the years too.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Mizell

customer_reviews.title: These were EXACTLY what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I knew I didn't want anymore coasters with the cork on top. No more cheaply made coasters. And I had some stone ones before that were of poor quality that really didn't work. These work perfectly. I used one this morning on my desk where I had a coke with ice. That glass always drips water when I drink from it. No dripping today :-)
customer_reviews.author: Speedy Geek

customer_reviews.title: Highly Reccomend
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace our cute picture coasters I bought online that would constantly stick to our cup or water would roll over onto the sides getting our wood furniture wet. These do not do that, so glad we found these as I would buy them them again if I needed more. Love the details on them, not all are the same which I like.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Like Magic
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy lifting a cold glass of water and watching the water spots disappear. These have a little weight to them and could likely cause a little damage if dropped on a wooden floor. Target sells this brand, but not this design. Would be a nice gift. Very classy! Can you tell I’m happy with my purchase? I am.
customer_reviews.author: BusyBee

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved these type of coasters. This set is the first without some type of design printed on them, and I will never get printed ones again! I didn't realize how much the printed design hindered the coaster. While the other coasters worked, these are so much better! The natural design in them is beautiful already. I'm glad I chose these this time!
customer_reviews.author: M. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: super
customer_reviews.text: They have not broken. They work very well. Good value and they absorb water in acceptable manner, but don't pour lots of water on them. Has cork backing which is nice and does not scratch tables. Extremely pleased with these high-quality coasters. Fits virtually all glasses from regular drinking glasses to pint or wine glasses!
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got them
customer_reviews.text: These coasters are solid--heavy, cork-backed chunks of sandstone. I keep one on my desk and on the coffee table, and they work so much better than any other coasters I've used. They won't scratch the wood, and the stone absorbs the water before it can run off. I'm now looking at trivets from the same company.
customer_reviews.author: SK Nash

customer_reviews.title: They really work!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. Not only are they a work of art, but they really work functionally. My husband insists on drinking out of plastic cups and uses lots of ice. We live in a warm climate so they condense and drip like crazy. These coasters suck it ALL right up - better than any other coaster I’ve had! Others left pools, these don’t at all. And they don’t stick to the glass/cup.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Beware - the picture is deceiving
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because the picture looked exactly like the thirstystone my daughter has (she purchased hers at a retail store). Please note the picture is nothing like this product. I had read comments by other reviewers that mentioned the product was just lines but ignored them because what I had seen in person was the same as the description. Well the reviews of just straight lines across the stone is correct. I gave it two stars just because I am sure it would function like a thirstystone of which I have in other decorative forms. If you are buying it for the appearance move to another choice.
customer_reviews.author: Conservewoman

customer_reviews.title: it was obvious these would do a much better job, as they absorb the moisture and take ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these coasters to replace silicone ones that I purchased previously that did not work as advertised because the honeycomb mold on the base is not deep enough to take condensation from glasses away from the glass bottom and as a result, the glass dripped large amounts of water on you when drinking. After only a few uses of these sandstone coasters, it was obvious these would do a much better job, as they absorb the moisture and take it away from the glass bottoms. They may chip easier, but they perform better for use in warm climates where condensation from cold drinks accumulates on the bottom of glasses and on the coasters.
customer_reviews.author: ECK Maui/Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Absorbent and pretty
customer_reviews.text: I actually loved these a lot. I ordered two different ones and decided to go with the one that matches our decor a bit better. These were very absorbent and you could see the water being absorbed and then you could see it go away rather quickly. They feel very solid. As for durability I cannot say as I returned them and kept the other one. But these are beautiful and functional!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Great size and very pretty
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I was a little worried that I’d get mismatched colors or boring patterns but mine are great! One of them is a little on the boring side but the other three are super awesome. I also love that they are the perfect size to fit my huge Starbucks mug.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L.

customer_reviews.title: The perfect thirsty stone moisture absorbing coaster
customer_reviews.text: Thirsty stones really suck in the moisture from drinks. They have a nice cork backing so you can sit them on any type furniture with no risk of damage. The cork also keeps them from sliding on slick surfaces. I really like these.
customer_reviews.author: Yorkiemom

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product. Attractive natural stone patterning on each coaster
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Attractive natural stone patterning on each coaster. Very absorbent. Even the condensation from a quite large glass of ice water is easily absorbed, and evaporates away without creating a mess. Coasters are absorbent and heavy enough so that they don't stick to the bottom of the glass as you lift it to take a drink. Exactly what I needed to keep my office desktop tidy.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Thigpen

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and appearance
customer_reviews.text: They look and work great. Very solid feeling with cork bottom to protect my desk. The Sandstone absorbs the heat off my coffee mug well and the sweat from my water bottle with ice sitting there couldn’t be happier. I spent a few extra bucks and bought the stand too and I’m pleased with that.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great coasters
customer_reviews.text: These are very durable and the size is perfect. We use mason jars that we put in the freezer to drink out of and these are the perfect size for those. When the cups sweat and go down the side the coaster catches it. The patterns are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Aumand

customer_reviews.title: BEST COASTERS EVER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I would LOVE a coaster. I mean, it's a coaster, right? Wrong! These are AMAZING!! I drink iced tea in a big glass and sip on it for a long time. They glass sweats and I have always had water coming off my coaster and onto my table, but not with these AMAZING coasters! They are GREAT!! BUY THEM NOW!! They are attractive, have cork on the bottom to not scratch your table, are super absorbent, and are a nice size for any of my glasses or coffee mugs. They are also heavy enough to not slide around too easilywhen you want them to stay put. I will purchase these again for other areas of my home!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas G. Scholtes

customer_reviews.title: A repeat gift for a coaster fanatic
customer_reviews.text: I bought these coasters as a gift for my mother, who is more than a little insistent on the use of coasters on her furniture. They absorb liquid without sticking to glasses, which is a major annoyance with most coasters. My mom liked them enough to request another set as a gift. I bought both sets with a wooden stand, which keeps them organized and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Fusion

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Absorbent, Attractive Coasters
customer_reviews.text: Really like they way the coasters look. True to site pictures, surface is absorbent so if your glass sweats with the heat and humidity, it does not drip all over your work space, table, or clothes. Coasters have a nice corked back panel attached to the bottom so they will not scratch your furniture when using. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Coaster
customer_reviews.text: This coaster really does its job. Unlike most coasters that look great and claim to absorb condensation moisture, this coaster really does! I have a set, and I've given sets to friends who live in Chicago where the summers are very humid and condensation can't be avoided. My friends love the coasters, and so do I.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective
customer_reviews.text: Work as advertised. I used a venti glass of iced drink and only a wet ring developed at the end. I was worried it didn't work as some claimed. Color however is a bit muted, not as vibrant as photo. Plain and simple yet classy. Would buy more
customer_reviews.author: Booluvgoo

customer_reviews.title: Great product, natural sandstone, cork bottoms, very absorbent, non-slip, non-stick
customer_reviews.text: Very absorbent, natural looking sandstone coasters that will NOT stick the bottom of a glass. My old coasters would temporarily stick to a water glass and then fall off half way up. I nearly beaned my cat with the old coaster so I chucked them, gave these a try and they work great. The surface is sandstone - a bit rough and they colors vary from stone to stone and they look cool. They have a thin natural cork bottom attached to them that makes them non-slip and non-scratch even on my glass coffee table top.
customer_reviews.author: RolidnotTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Best Coasters ever
customer_reviews.text: These are bad ass. I live in Florida and its amazing how these things work to not leave any condensation on my furniture. On very rare occasions my glass/cup/etc. suctions the stone where it will lift with my glass when i go to take a drink. And on one particular hot day, my unattended glass sweat so much the stone couldn't absorb the liquid fast enough and it pooled on the stone and dripped off as well as soaked the cork bottom. But after drying out for a few it was good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Fredo

customer_reviews.title: Absorbent and attractive
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a very absorbent coaster and these are perfect. With my precious cork coasters liquid would pool on the surface and need to be poured into the sink. These absorb any liquid and keep the surrounding area dry.
customer_reviews.author: C. E. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I had one set of Thirstystone coasters, and then a bunch of other coasters that aren't absorbent at all. So I ordered these to replace some of those non-absorbent ones, and they work great. The Desert Sand pattern looks elegant and not busy or fussy. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Buy these coasters!
customer_reviews.text: I have used these coasters for a few months and have absolutely zero complaints. Living in Alabama, land of high humidity, I was afraid they wouldn't dry completely, or would allow liquid to Leach into my table. That couldn't be farther from what happened. I haven't had any issues with leakage, or problems with them drying out. I have had a few coffee drips on them, and I just rinse the dirty coaster, let it dry overnight, and its back in the game good as new. I love these guys!
customer_reviews.author: Sonya P

customer_reviews.title: Protects my wood furniture!!
customer_reviews.text: By far the BEST coasters out there. Protects all of my expensive wood furniture that can’t get wet. Immediately soaks up any moisture or wet so that no liquid dribbles off on to the table. Highly recommend and well worth the price. I bought two sets.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: These coasters are winners.
customer_reviews.text: I like to sip a soda from a copper mug filled with ice. This in turn causes a profuse amount of sweat from the mug as it sits. I've tried all different kinds of coasters, and have been through about $500 in replacement tables due to falling asleep and having the mug sweat through the coaster. These coasters have soaked every drop of sweat off those mugs with the table underneath remaining dry, its like magic, for real. Best coasters around.
customer_reviews.author: WhatsItTouhya

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful coasters. Very high quality. Pleasantly surprised that the price I paid was for qty 4, not 1. I'm so happy with them, I'll probably give some as gifts. This is the desert sand color after a wet drink has been sitting on it.
customer_reviews.author: REF

customer_reviews.title: Sandstone
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these as a gift. I know they work well because I also have a set. The only bad thing is one of the coasters has a slight ridge which will cause the cup or mug to be off balance a bit. That being said, I really like how these absorb the moisture from cold cups.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Product photo not what I got
customer_reviews.text: It's nice, but the ones I got were rather bland and didn't contain any real visual texture unlike what was depicted online. I probably would now otherwise have chosen a wooden option instead, but these do the job in protecting my cherry furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Gidagorfen

customer_reviews.title: They really do absorb very well
customer_reviews.text: I hate getting glass sweat on me whenever I try to take a cold drink, and these have almost totally eradicated that issue. Absorbency is fantastic and they look nice to boot. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dariushd

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking coasters
customer_reviews.text: These coasters have a great look to them overall. They look very fancy and it’s now what my family uses regularly. The only downside is that the “absorbency” doesn’t really exist. I’m sure it does to a point. But if you pick up a glass off one of the coasters (especially one that is sweating a lot of course) there will be water all over the coaster. I mean not a big deal but just know it’s not really a feature.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Price

customer_reviews.title: These thirsty stones keep the water droplets soaked up so you don't drop water on yourself!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, always like thirstystone brand coasters. As advertised, if your drink "sweats" and droplets form this thirstystone does what it says and soaks up the droplets so you aren't dropping water on yourself. With the cork bottom they keep the tables, etc., clean and nice. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Protects your furniture
customer_reviews.text: These coasters are perfect and very well made. They are super absorbent , sturdy and strong. I love the natural sand color with hints of brown. I love how they do not move out of place as the bottom has a nice grip to avoid messes. The bottom is harmless and will not mess up your table. Classy look.
customer_reviews.author: ANDREA WATSON

customer_reviews.title: FOUR COASTERS
customer_reviews.text: Y'all, I thought I was only buying one coaster at this price, so imagine my surprise when I actually got FOUR?! Haha. Anyway, these are attractive, absorbent, and affordable: what more could you want from a set of coasters?
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Coffey

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as expected (excellent product).
customer_reviews.text: Absorbs moisture completely from a very icy cup. The area of the counter the coaster was on is cold but not wet.
customer_reviews.author: Damien Holland

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe I'm writing a review for a coaster but I have to say this is one fine coaster!
customer_reviews.text: Living in an area where our glasses sweat constantly was becoming a true first world problem, but seriously these coasters have been fantastic. They absorb the liquid immediately and do not stick to the bottom of our glasses. They do not warp or change shape once the liquid has been absorbed and dry out very easily. I like the design (all 4 were a little different but still aesthetically pleasing). I also purchased the Pedestal Coaster Holder in Dark Walnut and they are a great combination together. The underside of the coaster has a felt lining so you don't scratch your tables. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly H.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It soaks up all the moisture from my glass or bottle, I have no complaints and I'm not sure what went wrong in some of the other reviews. They're smooth and solid and not obtrusive in their coloring.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Best product for drippy cold drinks.
customer_reviews.text: I drink cold drink from frozen frosted mugs. The ice frost melts pretty quickly and these absorb every last bit of it. If these can handle that, they can handle just about anything.
customer_reviews.author: tjwash

customer_reviews.title: A functional and attractive coaster that really works.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these coasters because they look good and they keep your glasses from sticking to the coaster. We used them while on vacation and had to have a set. They really are nice. I was not satisfied with one coaster and they replaced all of them and gave me a fully paid return postage. I am really impressed with this company for their quality product and their customer service if there is a problem. I would recommend this company.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne H.

customer_reviews.title: Absorbent, dry quickly and attractive
customer_reviews.text: These stones absorb condensation well. I have had no wetness on my surfaces. It is important to let them dry completely. which they do overnight. I am well pleased and enjoy the look of them too.
customer_reviews.author: R.K. of VA

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Just received these today so I can’t write on durability but they are beautiful!! So much nicer in person. The cork backing is great so it doesn’t mark the table. These are a heavy material. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: busyactonmom

customer_reviews.title: The world's best coaster
customer_reviews.text: I've tried them all and most just spread the water around, stick to the glass and cause as much damage as not having a coaster. These are different. They absorb an insane amount of moisture and never pass any to the surface. Outstanding product.
customer_reviews.author: Clay Konnor

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have
customer_reviews.text: No more puddle of condensate forming on either a typical coaster or worse, your precious table! Have you ever experienced a wet coaster sticking to your beverage glass? This product solves these issues. Save the "table salt trick" for impressing your buddies at the company picnic.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Must have for any drinks with ice
customer_reviews.text: Everyone you know who has crummy cardboard or coated coasters should get these for their next birthday or holiday. Never had these stick-and-lift and they’re super absorbent for sweating glasses. We have them in every room.
customer_reviews.author: Jon W. Shervey

customer_reviews.title: Thirstystone Coasters save your table top
customer_reviews.text: Thirstystone coasters look beautiful and perform as described and expected. Even though the glass may sweat and water collect on the coaster under your glass, no worries, it will evaporate away and not touch your table top.
customer_reviews.author: Gaylen E. Moore

customer_reviews.title: NO STICK!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these coasters. Just what I needed. No longer will my beverage glass/mug stick to the coaster. In addition, the coasters are very attractive and clean easily (I use a diluted Simple Green solution). They are just as they appear in the photo: a natural stone that is compatible with any décor. Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: S. Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Coasters!
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing some very old stone coasters and these looked like and excellent choice. And, although other reviewers may have had issues with the designs, the ones in my set were lovely! Each one reminds me of a desert scene. They also absorb moisture off my glass like a little sponges and return to their previously lovely pattern once dry. I'm so glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Nice elegant, clean look. These are replacing on stone coasters with Labs on them that were hand me downs that I have had for years. These are a very nice improvement. :)
customer_reviews.author: leitning17

customer_reviews.title: Really dry stone
customer_reviews.text: This is a great coaster that absorbs the fluids with ease. They have cork underneath so they don't scratch any surfaces. They dry out on their own and can be immersed for short period. I like the light color and the natural look.
customer_reviews.author: G. L. FrostTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: They keep water off your furniture
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because the stone absorbs the sweat from a glass. Plastic coasters just gather the liquid at the base of the coaster and then it runs off onto furniture. Stone is a much better option.
customer_reviews.author: razz

customer_reviews.title: Finally a coaster that does it's job
customer_reviews.text: Finally a coaster that does it's job. It soaks up without rotting. It doesn't stick to the glass. It looks good. It's high quality and the cork on the bottom keeps the sandstone from scratching surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: dman

customer_reviews.title: So glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I really debated about getting these & spending that much on coasters. So glad I did! I've had cheap coasters in the past & if I ever need to get another set I will be buying thirty stone. So far i have had these over a yr with 4 kids & they work like a charm no marks on my antique table I liked them so much I bought a set to match my living room & wanted to give them as gifts lol only thing I've noticed it's a little more difficult to keep rings off the light colored ones. I don't mind so much since they are still performing the job of keeping water marks from being everywhere
customer_reviews.author: christina miller

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't absorb the condensation :(
customer_reviews.text: For a week these coasters worked really good. After that it doesn't absorb the condensation. I followed the instructions to clean it because they said that the pores can get clogged and wont soak up the water, but that didn't help. The condensation ends up building up to the point it starts to drip down on my table
customer_reviews.author: jan123

customer_reviews.title: This product does exactly as it advertises! No complaints!
customer_reviews.text: I used the Coasters for cold as well as hot drinks. I was hesitant at first to place my smoothie on top of the Coaster thinking it would definitely leave a ring but, surprisingly it didn’t! So there not only an eye catcher for beauty but more importantly, they do the job! No rings!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Marshall

customer_reviews.title: I like the stone
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a thirsty stone set of coasters and was happy to see them on amazon. I remember how great they were when I used them at a friends. I was happy to see a variety of styles. The set I ordered are working great at protecting surfaces and sucking up the extra condensation along with looking really nice too.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Great style and great price
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting some round sandstone coasters for a while so I ordered 2 sets of the Thirstystone Drink Coasters. The design on each one is a little different and looks like gently windswept sand. They look very classy and the cork bottom is perfect to prevent scratches to any surface, and I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Stylish Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I drink a LOT of ice cold water, and have always hated the way the condensation creates a puddle or sticks to the standard coasters. These coasters absorb the water very well, and look cool to boot. Very happy purchaser!
customer_reviews.author: Tod Y.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I expected a set of 4 coasters to be in the same color family. Unfortunately, 2 matched the color displayed as Cinnabar on the website and 2 matched the color displayed as Desert Sand on the website. I would have been happy with 4 of either color, but not 2 of one color and 2 of another color.
customer_reviews.author: N A

customer_reviews.title: No drips on clothes or furniture!  Just buy them and thank me later!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd set of thirsty stone... the only coasters I’ll ever purchase. They leave no liquid on the stone to drip. What’s not to love?! If you haven’t tried them, do it now! You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: ~Jada~

customer_reviews.title: Best coasters ever!
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely the best coasters! The soak up condensation well and consistently, my glass doesn't drip, and 99% of the time my glass doesn't stick to them!
customer_reviews.author: tesla323

customer_reviews.title: Absorbency is Great
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a coaster where the water didn't puddle underneath the glass and then just cause a bigger mess by overflowing onto the table I'm trying to protect, I live in Michigan so we have quite a bit of humidity in the summer months. These coasters have been perfect for this need. The condensation from the glass soaks in immediately, problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Viele

customer_reviews.title: Great coasters!
customer_reviews.text: Great coasters, have not left any water marks from any of my beverages. This was important to me since I use a lot of ice and the glass tends to have a lot of condensation. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Handles all of the condensation!
customer_reviews.text: These handle all of the condensation coming off of our glasses with ease. There was some minor chipping around the edges on a few of the coasters but not very noticeable. The pattern and color is lovely....one coaster has a shadow from a darker colored drink that must have dripped onto it but not a big concern. I ordered another set for my dining room table. The surface is a bit rough and scratchy fyi.
customer_reviews.author: Amber S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and very absorbent
customer_reviews.text: I must admit I was skeptical about stone coasters that would absorb condensation from glasses. Having bought the Cinnabar Thirstystone Natural Sandstone Coasters, however, I'm a believer. Dripping condensation from my iced coffee makes a wet spot on the stone and goes no further. This design is very attractive and the cork bottoms are perfectly centered and skid free. I haven't seen what would happen in an extremely wet situation but for now, I am completely satisfied with this purchase. One note: the coaster / holder combo was not available when I bought my set. Buying both together appears to be a pretty good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for absorbing sweating glasses. I live in a very humid climate and these are the best coasters I’ve ever owned. Keeps the drink rings off my tables!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful craftsmanship! Exactly as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: I love these coasters! They are beautifully made and each one is just a little bit different. They are the quality you see in the pictures and I’m so happy with them. They are real sandstone so they are porous and absorb water quickly
customer_reviews.author: alexis

customer_reviews.title: Great coaster
customer_reviews.text: Heavy and beautiful. They look amazing because they are natural stone and they go well with my wooden table. I would recommend them. They came quickly and packaged well. Of course...they absorb well!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Y

customer_reviews.title: Great coasters
customer_reviews.text: I love these coasters! They are beautiful, unique, and best of all functional! The coasters have a cork backing, which prevents them from scratching my furniture. I live in a humid climate, so cold drinks tend to sweat a lot. These are super absorbent. Color and size were exactly what I expected. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: ChewbeccaSR

customer_reviews.title: Quality control issues with cork
customer_reviews.text: The coasters looked great but they have quality control problems with the cork on the base. One of them had cork glued over the coaster and no matter how much I scrubbed the glue has stained permanently the coaster. Other two had cork pieces breaking from the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Medina

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome coasters
customer_reviews.text: Sandstone looks great. And it protects my desk perfectly even when my glass is a 90/10 ice/water split. Every coaster is different. Very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Emilee

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two sets of these coasters. They are more pinkish in color than I would prefer but they have a nice layer of cork on the bottom so they don’t scratch my tables and are flat without a rim so every cup sits easily on them. They absorb moisture quickly and after a few months of use there are no visible water evaporation stains. Very happy we chose these coasters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absorbs water from sweating drinks
customer_reviews.text: I was using a wooden block before this and was frustrated with how it would leave puddles on the block and on the bottom of the glass, which would occasionally drip off the glass onto my pants as I sip my beverage. With these coasters, all the condensations gets absorbed into the stone. It's magical
customer_reviews.author: Doug Mezanino

customer_reviews.title: Thirstystone (100% Sandstone) Drink Coasters are the BEST!
customer_reviews.text: What's really cool about these sandstone coasters, is that they are 100% sandstone, which means that they are truly THIRSTY and absorb the glass-condensation, rather than having the condensation pool up on the painted coasters. I decided to go 100% sandstone after a guest picked up his glass of ice-water, and the painted coaster stuck to the glass. These are naturally beautiful. I bought two sets.
customer_reviews.author: Chiwauka

customer_reviews.title: very pretty
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. The first set I received were all busted up so I returned and they sent them to me again. This time they were perfect. Had them for several months... Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Lovelace

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and they really work with cold drinks
customer_reviews.text: They are so classy and they really work. Cold drinks do not bring the coaster with them when you lift them up for a drink. Fantastic purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Donna from California

product_meta.title: Thirstystone Cinnabar Brand, Multicolor All Natural Sandstone-Durable Stone with Varying Patterns, Every Coaster Is An Original, 4 inch round
product_meta.description: Size:4 inch roundThirsty stone coasters are a beautiful way to combine beauty and functionality in a stunning set of all natural Sandstone Coasters for drinks. This coaster set is made up from naturally absorbent Sandstone that is cut into 4" Diameter circles to fit most drink containers. A stunning way to protect your furniture surface from water rings and condensation, these durable drink Coasters provide eye-catching originality and a sense of bringing the outdoors inside. Keep them as a beautiful addition to any room in the house, or give a set away as an original and useful gift. Sure to be a conversation piece!
feature_bullets: All natural sandstone - these Thirstystone coasters are made from natural sandstone, with an organic design derived from natural stone formations. Every coaster has a varying pattern and adds a stunning piece of decor to any room.
4" Round - these natural stone coasters are four inches in diameter and one half inch thick. Fit perfectly in a Thirstystone pedestal coaster holder.

Protective - tired of drips on your kitchen counter or water rings on your coffee table? Use these Thirstystone coasters to protect in every room of the house. Dining Table, kitchen, bedroom night stands, Coffee table or living room end tables, These coasters are great for anywhere!
No scratches - our Thirstystone all Natural sandstone coasters have a natural cork backing to protect any surface from scratches or scuffs and keep the coaster from sliding.
Care - Since these coasters are made from true stone, please gently hand wash with soap and water, then let completely dry. Please let coaster Dry between uses.
